==========
How to use
==========

Main index
----------

.. image:: _static/resolution.png

- You can click and see profile in upper right corner.
- with search, you can find your filename with input key.
- You can click subject namem in leftbar and add schedule in full callendar.

.. image:: _static/resolution2.png

- When you click subject there will be week tile appear.
- int week tile, you can add your file and preview files.

.. image:: _static/feature1.png

- If you want to customize your subject, you can just modify js file.
